summary: Fixed clipping of Gauldur\'s Amulet and fragments + optional power boost.
descriptionHtml:
DESCRIPTION [version 0.2]*:
------------
This mod fixes clipping of Gauldur\'s Amulet and all Gauldur fragments.
There is an OPTIONAL .esp file for those who think that the amulet is not true to the legend.

If you think the amulet is overpowered [I tried to make it powerful AND balanced as much as I was able] or still too weak or you have an idea on how to make it better, please comment and leave your suggestions. Thank you.

* Version 0.1 changes Gauldur\'s Amulet model with Saarthal Amulet model, nothing else [picture No1].

POWER CHANGES:
--------------
THE GAULDUR AMULET*
 Health, Stamina & Magicka +30 points
 Health & Stamina regenerate 20% faster
 Magicka regenerates 25% faster
 Poison & Disease resistance 35%
 Magic resistance 25%
* there is too many stats to fit into description [I don\'t know how to change that, so description is a quote from \'Lost Legends\' book], but you can see all boosts in the ACTIVE EFFECTS in-game.

FOLGUNTHUR FRAGMENT
 Health +20 points
 Health regenerates 10% faster
 Poison resistance 25%

GEIRMUND FRAGMENT
 Stamina +20 points
 Stamina regenerates 10% faster
 Disease resistance 25%

SAARTHAL FRAGMENT
 Magicka +20 points
 Magicka regenerates 15% faster
 Magic resistance 15%

FILES:
------
1. ClippingFix V0.2 [works for both genders]
2. GauldurAmuletBoost.esp

INSTALL:
--------
1. Copy MESHES folder into your Skyrim DATA folder [this will fix the clipping].
2. Copy GauldurAmuletBoost.esp into your Skyrim DATA folder and check it in DATA FILES section  of game launcher.

UNINSTALL:
----------
Delete all files copied during installation.

CREDITS:
--------
To Dave Humphrey for his SkyEdit tool.
To developers of FOMM.
And to Zaldiir, InAComaDial999 & mindinavoid for setting my mind in motion ;]

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Enjoy!
deLooney
author: deLooney
